title: Serena Williams belts out a rock classic during lively karaoke session in London
text:
She's a proven force to be reckoned with on the tennis court, having scooped a jaw-dropping 23 major singles titles – the most by any man or woman in the Open Era.

And Serena Williams, 39, proved she's also no slouch on the microphone on Sunday night, when she took to the stage at London's Bunga Bunga for a karaoke session.

In a video clip shared on Instagram, the sports superstar is seen belting out Bon Jovi's 1986 classic track Livin' On A Prayer, as a crowd of revellers sing along with her.

Scroll down for video

Rock the mic: Serena Williams, 39, proved she's no slouch on the microphone on Sunday night, when she took to the stage at London's Bunga Bunga for a karaoke session

Serena oozed confidence as she performed before the partygoers, putting on a show that came complete with obligatory fist pumps as a live band backed her.

The Michigan-born star stepped out in style for the occasion, sporting black skinny jeans and a matching top, which she teamed with heavy duty lace-up boots.

Adding a flourish of colour to her ensemble with a leopard-print scarf, she wore her honey brown tresses in bold and bouncy curls for her night out in Covent Garden.

Classic: In a video clip shared on Instagram, the sports superstar is seen belting out Bon Jovi's 1986 classic track Livin' On A Prayer, as a crowd of revellers sing along with her

Serena's outing comes several days after she and her husband Alexis Ohanian, 36, took their two-year-old daughter with them to the wedding of Alexis's sister Hayley.

'She took her flower girl job very seriously!!! @hexner14 @js_poodles congrats. So happy for you both,' Serena captioned a series of photos on Instagram.

The images showed Serena in a pink Azazie Kaleigh bridesmaid gown and her daughter in a white flower girl dress.

Serena's husband Alexis can also be seen in one of the photos as the two lift little Olympia into the air, each holding one of her hands.

Stage presence: Serena oozed confidence as she performed before the partygoers, putting on a show that came complete with obligatory fist pumps as a live band backed her

Stylish: The Michigan-born star stepped out in style for the occasion, sporting black skinny jeans and a matching top, which she teamed with heavy duty lace-up boots

Alexis donned a blue tuxedo with a pink tie and brown dress shoes as he held his daughter's flower girl basket in his hand.

Meanwhile, Serena stepped out in a pink halter top bridesmaid gown as she carried a pink and white bouquet in her hand.

Ever the doting parent, Serena often shares snapshots of her daughter on her Instagram account, along with adorable captions.

On Alexis's second birthday back in September, she took to Instagram to share a heart-warming shot of her offspring, along with the caption: 'The last 2 years have been my greatest accomplishment.'

Wedding season: Earlier this month, the star, shared an adorable snap of herself alongside daughter Olympia, two, and husband Alexis Ohanian, 36, at his sister Hayley's wedding

Doting parent: Ever the doting parent, Serena often shares snapshots of her daughter on her Instagram account, along with adorable captions
description: She's a proven force to be reckoned with on the tennis court, having scooped a jaw-dropping 23 major singles titles - the most by any man or woman in the Open Era.
